DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the safety of ipilimumab and dasatinib combination therapy in patients with CML
DOC.brief_title: Study of Ipilimumab and Dasatinib Combination Therapy in Patients With Chronic or Accelerated Chronic Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Ph+ CML on dasatinib therapy Loss of cytogenetic or molecular response while on dasatinib therapy On stable dose of dasatinib for a minimum of 12 weeks and with < 14 day interruption of treatment Blast crisis CML Autoimmune disease Uncontrolled or significant cardiovascular disease
